name: Boy with Disorder
description:
Boy with Disorder - a game about a boy with a disorder, according to adults. The boy wakes up at night and cannot fall asleep from insomnia, and his goal is to survive until 6 in the morning, in a reality where 2 worlds are mixed - the world of people and the world of spirits.

Controls:
A and D/arrows - walking 
E - eat cakes
Q - become a ghost
W or S - go up or down the stairs
Space - get out of the ghost's hands
